dict.acceptation: 去过了；be的过去分词；老练（指性事）；以前也经历过；
用来表示某人或某物即主语本身，用来表示某人或某物属于某一群体或有某种性质（ be的过去分词 ）；在，存在；不受干扰；

sent.orig: All sorts of sleeping bags have been developed and many have been given extensive trials under various conditions.
sent.trans: 各式的睡袋被试制出来，并且有许多曾在不同条件下广泛试用。

sent.orig: Atomic energy has been discovered for many years, but so far it has not been widely used in industry or in our daily life.
sent.trans: 原子能已发现多年，但至今仍未广泛用于工业或日常生活方面。

sent.orig: For the past month or more, she had been unusually happy and had been really throwing herself into her work.
sent.trans: 在最近的一个多月里， 她异乎寻常地快乐，工作也做得勤快。

sent.orig: Fortunately he was sent to the hospital in time. If he had been delayed half an hour, he would have not been still alive.
sent.trans: 多亏及时送医院，再晚半小时他就没希望了。

sent.orig: He escaped death by a hair's breadth.If the other car had been going any faster, he would certainly have been killed.
sent.trans: 他简直是死里逃生。要是那辆车开得再快一点，他肯定被撞死了。
